scripts.build: $npm_execpath run ready && $npm_execpath run format && NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=8192" docusaurus build
scripts.clear: rm -rf 'blog' && rm -rf 'docs' && rm -rf 'i18n /**/*.md' && cp tools/안녕.md i18n/ko/docusaurus-plugin-content-docs/current/Hey.md && rm -rf 'i18n /**/*.png' && rm -rf 'i18n /**/*.svg' && rm -rf 'i18n /**/*.jpg' && rm -rf 'i18n /**/*.jpeg' && rm -rf 'i18n /**/*.gif'
scripts.dev: $npm_execpath run ready && $npm_execpath run format && docusaurus start
scripts.ko: $npm_execpath run ready && $npm_execpath run format && docusaurus start --locale ko
scripts.qa:start: $npm_execpath run ready && $npm_execpath run format && $npm_execpath run build && $npm_execpath serve
scripts.readme:
cp tools/README.src.md README.md && printf "

## Last updated 

$(date)
" >> README.md
scripts.ready: $npm_execpath run clear && python3 tools/sanitize.py && python3 tools/process-blog.py && python3 tools/process-docs.py && python3 tools/process-backlinks.py && python3 tools/img-alt-to-figcaption.py
scripts.save: $npm_execpath ready && $npm_execpath run readme && $npm_execpath run scc && $npm_execpath run format && git add . && git commit -m 'wrote something' && git push
scripts.scc:
printf '
## Stats
' >> README.md && printf '
```
' >> README.md && scc . >> README.md && printf '```
' >> README.md
